title: Championship Ashe Border
body: Will it only be usable during worlds? or will it be usable forever, as long as you use the championship ashe skin?

replies.body: The border will be yours forever, but of course that border *only* works for the champion skin it's intended for.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xEVAgyTy,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-21T22:42:08.392+0000)
>
> The border will be yours forever, but of course that border *only* works for the champion skin it's intended for.

Is it possible to get the border and the chroma before getting the skin, and still have them work for it?

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

> [{quoted}](name=Pokeobi,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xEVAgyTy,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-09-23T22:51:47.372+0000)

> Is it possible to get the border and the chroma before getting the skin, and still have them work for it?

You can get the border and the chroma before yes but you got to purchase before the end of the sale and item ticket time limit
